problem_text:
3.4. Embedding of a Sobolev space into the space of distributions
Let Ω be an open set in Rn. By Ll,p_0(Ω, µ) we denote the completion of C∞_0(Ω)
in the norm
∥∇^l u∥_{Lp(Ω)} + (∫_Ω |u|^p dµ)^{1/p},
where p ∈ [1, ∞] and µ is a measure.
The question of embedding Ll,p_0(Ω, 0) into the distribution space [C∞_0(Ω)]′
is completely solved in [23] for p = 2 and by [69, Theorem 15.2] for all values
of p.
Problem. Find necessary and sufficient conditions on the measure µ ensuring
the embedding of Ll,p_0(Ω, µ) into [C∞_0(Ω)]′.
